<@- for doc in classes @> <@ if doc.URL and doc.private != true and doc.featured and doc.name -@> <@- endif @> <@ endfor -@> <@- for doc in interfaces @> <@ if doc.URL and doc.private != true and doc.featured and doc.name -@> <@- endif @> <@ endfor -@> <@- for doc in typeAliases @> <@ if doc.URL and doc.private != true and doc.featured and doc.name -@> <@- endif @> <@ endfor -@>

Classes

<$ doc.name $> <@ if doc.description @><$ doc.description.split("\n\n")[0] | marked $><@ endif @>

Interfaces

<$ doc.name $> <@ if doc.description @><$ doc.description.split("\n\n")[0] | marked $><@ endif @>

Types

<$ doc.name $> <@ if doc.description @><$ doc.description.split("\n\n")[0] | marked $><@ endif @>
